attributes.action: Reconsider the referendums outcome, due to the exposed propaganda by vote leave
attributes.background: Nigel Farage in less than 24 hours has already started denying promises made by the vote leave campaign. People cannot be expected to make an informed decision when propaganda is still such a rife tactic in our political system. We want the government to use their power to reconsider the outcome.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.

If you would like the UK not to leave the EU, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133606

If you would like Parliament to decide on the UK's membership of the EU:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
